A Taiwanese born British designer has revealed that sales doubled after Kate Middleton was seen carrying one of her bags on three separate royal engagements.

articles.author: Katie Harris
articles.title: Queen won't have to deal with Prince Harry 'problem' after Trooping the Colour cancelled - Express
articles.description: THE Queen's official birthday celebration being cancelled means the royals will not have to deal with the question of Prince Harry and Prince Andrew taking part, according to an expert.

articles.author: Ellie Harrison
articles.title: Nick Broomfield: ‘I was terrified when I confronted Courtney Love’ - The Independent
articles.description: The gonzo filmmaker has made a career out of turning setbacks into strengths. He talks to Ellie Harrison about his confrontational style and how he changed tack for his most intimate film to date
